page.title: 04GREAT MEOLS:TWO CHILDREN.
page.content: {Hywel Williams:}Age 11.Born Wirral (Clatterbridge).D.O.B.14:1:1974. Height 1.4m, Mass 36Kg,Blonde,Brown eyes. {Hobbies}include Rugby, Football,Tennis and Swimming.{Favourite Lessons- {Maths.,Art. Dislikes}Science. Enjoys eating Lasagne,Fresh Orange Juice. Dislikes Corned Beef and tea. {T.V.-}Watches "Minder","Spitting Images".Favourite singer Phil Collins. {Kendra Detlaff:}Age 10.Born Wirral (Clatterbridge).D.O.B.18:5:1974. Height 1.46m, Mass 32Kg,Brown hair,Hazel eyes. {Hobbies}include piano,recorder,Girl Guides,swimming.{Favourite Lesson-} Art. Enjoys eating chips,roast potatoes and meat(except liver.) {T.V.-}Watches"Top of the Pops"",Blue Peter." Attends {Sunday School.
